titleStmt.title: Eliah's abatement: or, Corruption in the saints. Discovered and distinguished in a sermon, preached at Chatham in Kent, at the Funeral of that faithful minister of the Gospel, Mr. Gaulter Roswell, M.a. late preacher there. / By Tho. Case, M.A. and rector of Giles in the Fields.
titleStmt.author: Case, Thomas, 1598-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.T. for Luke Fawn, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Parrat in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the sign of the Parrat in Pauls Church-yard
